title: Comparison Operators and Logic
description: In this task, read the four expressions in this program and decide whether each is a true or false statement. Then drag over the correct answer block. Run the program and select the check button to see if you are right.
hint:
This problem combines what you have learned about expressions, comparisons, and logic. Comparisons include less than, greater than, less than equal, greater than equal, and not equal(i.e. <, >, <=, >=, and not=). Logic uses and, or, and not. These compare two values or flop the value and return true or false.

Don't forget to apply the order of operation rules and logic rules to the problems. If you are not able to find the correct answers, use the output block to output the values of the variables to get the right response.
